resources.string: Do you want to save a log file?
Are you sure you want to delete the fill log file from:

• Switch magnet to He fill mode on magnet control computer 
• Record magnet data in logbook 
• Turn flowmeter off (yellow light turns on when meter is off) 
• Open He valve on top of magnet 
• Get He Dewar from D floor 
• Wait until pressure P2 is below 980 mbar and stable 
• Check that pressure P3 > P2 
• Attach He dewar to recovery 
• Press red button to open recovery system 
• Open gaseous He valve on wall (make sure needle valve is closed and green light off) 
• Heat upper part of transfer line, remove and check O-ring, take brass plug out to open transfer line 
• Open He port on magnet: only remove black plug then quickly insert transfer line and re-insert the brass plug 
• Insert lower part of transfer line in the He Dewar with output port fully open until He flame is visible 
• Connect upper and lower part of transfer line with output port of transfer line VERY open 
• Slowly open transfer line (monitor pressure P2 and avoid pressure spike) 
• Press green button to close He recovery system 
• Slowly open needle valve and regulate pressure P2 around 1040 mbar 
• Monitor the fill, keep an eye on the pressure, when the dewar is empty the pressure P2 will spike, so be ready to stop the fill 
• Stop the fill: close output port of transfer line on top of magnet, turn green button off and close needle valve (red button should remain on) 
• Remove transfer lines 
• Return He Dewar 
• Close He valve on top of magnet 
• Turn flowmeter on (yellow light off)
